pages.text: Magic Infusion is the Art of creating Items with the help of an $(l:falling_stars/infused_starstone_block)$(item)Infused Starstone Block$().$(br2)Up to 4 items, including a magic catalyst, are placed on top of the Block, followed by a power input. Then the Infused Starstone Block will channel the energy of the placed items into a single point, in order to create something new, that would be impossible to achieve otherwise
